Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Details1. I like to watch stars at night from time to time and I happened to notice the one zip upward and to the right. I was at home with my bf. 2. I noticed it was the only starlike object flickering brightly than the rest. 3. I thought the object was a star or aircraft. 4. It made fluent zips and dashes with purpose to the left and right then would hover for a few seconds then go in circular motions clockwise and counter clockwise. 5. I was creeped out at first I have never seen anything make such movements before then the more I watched I became more intrigued and couldn't take my eyes off it. 6. I never lost sight it's still hovering as I write this.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Madbury
There were no other sightings in Madbury on or around April 17th 2013
Summary: Small starlike hovering light with rapid circular motions sometimes zipping left to right or clockwise/counterclockwise
